review_data.title: A very nice spot for food and drinks
review_data.content: The Regenboden bar is located in the Niederdorf (Old Town) and is open daily at 11a.m., Sunday at 14.00. It’s a bit hidden so make sure you have the correct address to find the place. There is also a rear courtyard over-looking Rosenhof court. The...More

review_data.title: Especially nice in the summer
review_data.content: The backyard of the bar is a very nice place to sit in the summer, surrounded by old houses in the middle of the city but it's s quiet place when it's not too busy. Good selection of drinks, nice staff.

review_data.title: fancy a proper burger?
